text: Robin Hack (; born 27 August 1998) is a German professional footballer who plays as a forward for German club Arminia Bielefeld. ==Career== In June 2019, Hack signed for 1. FC Nürnberg from 1899 Hoffenheim. After two seasons at Nürnberg, Hack moved to Arminia Bielefeld in August 2021 on a contract until 2025. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Sportspeople from Baden-Württemberg
title: Robin Hack
